programmes.show_description: Contest winners try to solve a fake murder for a grand prize, but the event goes awry when a real murder occurs and secrets are uncovered. Cozy crime thriller. (2025)
After a video of her goes viral, a mechanic finds herself falling for a charming publicist as they aim to turn her into the first female host of the world's biggest car show. (2023)

Teleshopping.
When Amanda is partnered up with Sam at work, she has no idea that he is the man she has been flirting with in a chatroom. Can their fiery online chemistry hold up in real life? (2022)
Single chef Lidia sees her future plans fall apart when arrogant tech innovator Danny buys her restaurant and plans to completely remodel it. Can she convince him that less is more? (2023)
The owner of a popular caf√© could lose everything when a major celebrity is dumped there. Can she get him and his would-be-fiancee back together, or will she fall for him herself? (2023)
When two colleagues are mistaken for a couple, they must keep up appearances to not disappoint their biggest client. But could their little white lie turn into something more? (2023)
Lilly, a hopeless romantic and literary enthusiast, is surprised when her wish to talk to her favourite author comes true and Jane Austen herself appears in her life. (2024)
A project manager must choose between nurturing a blooming romance in her small hometown in the USA and moving to London to pursue her dream job. (2021)
Sparks fly between a wedding guide creator and an uninspired artist as they renovate a run-down cottage for a couple's dream wedding. (2023)
Ella agrees to go on honeymoon with her pal Lindsey after being jilted at the altar. But Lindsey finds love on the trip and is forced hide the holiday romance from her best friend. (2023)
Amy travels to Venice to convince Chef Marcello to join her company's new venture. After Marcello declines, Amy turns up the heat. Will Marcello fold? (2024)
As she enters a new chapter in her life, a bookstore owner finds love and purpose after agreeing to review a famous author's new novel. (2024)
Relationship coach Sam believes she can fix any romance and she's creating a podcast to prove it. But then producer Josh poses some unexpected hurdles. (2023)

Working together could put a budding personal stylist and an aspiring travel photographer on a path to their dream jobs, but will they lose their hearts along the way? (2022)
A blogger is offered her own column after her post about a terrible date goes viral. But there's a catch - to keep writing good content, she needs to keep seeing the bad date. (2023)
The Postables return as they try to identify the intended recipients of a trio of dead letters that have a surprising, personal impact on all of them. (2024)
A makeup manufacturer gets her big shot when she teams up with an investment executive, but can she keep the magic that made her product a success? Perhaps with love, she will. (2023)
Georgie, a travel writer, travels to Melbourne, where she meets Zach, an ex-Australian footballer who agrees to be her tour guide and shows her that there's more to life than work. (2026)
Hazel seeks out the help of trivia host Theo when she gets a second chance at promoting her new subscription box on a major Boston morning show. (2022)
Contest winners try to solve a fake murder for a grand prize, but the event goes awry when a real murder occurs and secrets are uncovered. Cozy crime thriller. (2025)
In order to save her father's restaurant, an interior designer partners up with a celebrity chef to revamp the place before time runs out. (2022)
No mission is impossible for MI5 agent Claire... until she goes undercover as the royal nanny and spends her Christmas with charming Prince Colin. (2023)
